title: Hackers are exploiting ArrayOS AG VPN flaw to plant webshells
snippet: Threat actors have been exploiting a command injection vulnerability in Array AG Series VPN devices to plant webshells and create rogue users. [...]

title: Alert sent for Nevada earthquake that did not happen
snippet: An erroneous alert warning of a major Nevada earthquake reached as far as California before being withdrawn.

title: 'All Israeli people are with us', parents of last dead hostage in Gaza tell BBC
snippet: The body of Ran Gvili, a 24-year-old Israeli police officer, is the last not yet returned by Hamas from Gaza.

title: Suspect arrested in pipe bomb incident on eve of Jan 6, ending years-long manhunt
snippet: The bombs were placed the night before the 6 January riots, and were discovered as rioters began to storm the Capitol.

title: Admiral testified Hegseth did not give 'kill them all' order, US lawmakers say
snippet: Admiral Frank Bradley, who gave the order for a second strike on a drug boat, was on Capitol Hill briefing lawmakers about the September incident.

title: Israel strikes south Lebanon after first direct talks in decades
snippet: The Israeli military says it struck Hezbollah sites, less than 24 hours after Israel and Lebanon sent civilian envoys to meet.
